channel.title: Extended essay on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Extended essay on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Extended essay marking
item.description: Marking the EE 5 assessment criteria, total of 34 points A: Focus and method (topic, research question, methodology), 0-6 points B: Knowledge and understanding (context, psychology specific terminology and concepts), 0-6 points C: Critical thinking (research, analysis, discussion and evaluation), 0-12 points D: Presentation (structure, layout), 0-4 points E: Engagement (process, research focus), 0-6 points Criterion A: Focus and method This criterion focuses on the topic, the research question and the methodology.
